dimension: 41 x 19 3/16 in. (104.14 x 48.74 cm) (without ties or fringe)
title: Martingale
description: two long felt strips with geometric beaded designs; central rectangular beaded panel connects strips; multicolored felt fringe with bells
creditline: Gift of funds from the N. Bud and Beverly Grossman Foundation in honor of Dr. Evan M. Maurer, Director Emeritus, for his visionary leadership of The Minneapolis Institute of Arts, 1988-2005
